name: Once Upon a time (itch) (Ditzie)
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg.  With a new topic  every week, Game Design Students develop a prototype-like game to improve their GameDev skills by coming up with quick solutions with minimal resources.

The given topic for this project : "End of the World".

Once Upon a Time is a walking Simulator about denial and forgetting about your worries.

Game Description  

Key Features

-Tread a carefully crafted path and let the athmosphere take effect  ̵o̷n̸ ̶y̴o̷u̶

-Encounter s̶̱̮̈́t̵͎͌r̶̖͆͝ả̵̧̩̚n̵͎͗ģ̸̹̀e̷̥̥̒ happenings until you reach the end on the top of the̵̞͊ ̸̳̂h̵̩̒i̷̹̔ĺ̴͇l̷̬̋

-Enjoy the pretty sunshine and beautifully singing birds

-Forget about your worries

-Forget about the̶̗̾  p̸̜̑ṛ̶͊ȅ̷͔s̸̠̿ē̴̗n̵̹͐t̶̡͗

-Forget ̷̤̈a̸̤̍ǫ̵͝ut te p̸̜̑ṛ̶͊ȅ̷͔s̸̠̿ē̴̗n̵̹͐t̶̡͗

-̷̨̬̘̳̖͍̳͓̆̆͛̏̒͛̈́͋͐̏F̷̡͖̖͉̥͓͕͖̝͉̠̓̍̀͛̆͑̎͊̄̑̈o̵̧̪͈̟̹̯̝̠̹͚̲̣͐̏̔̋̉̓̃̈͆͂̾̑̅̈͒́̀̃͑͑̅̚͠͝r̷̛̯̣͚̯̔̾̌̅͋̇̄̒͛͐̈̏͗̚͝g̸̠͉̜͚̖̝̟̰̯̩̒͗̌́̓̅͆͂̀̄̂́̽͋̈̑̍̚͝͝e̸̦̹͙͔͕̩̭͈̩̮͓̝̠̻̅̌ẗ̵̡͕͎̫̤̺̹̝͕̳͍͆͂̈́̎ ̷̧̺͈͉͔͖̪̭̻̗͙͉͎̘̩̖̱̘͉͚̰̉̽́̓͜á̶̪̱̬̙͂̓̌̏̎̎b̶̨̰̺̞̘̬̹̙̥̞̥̙̤̩̞̙̫̞͖̟̳̤̈́̃͒ọ̶̧̨͙̙̩̘̒͗̒̇̿̍̈́̂̽͛͒̏̄̏̍̓͑͒͘͝͝
